original_text: So the king called the Gibeonites and spoke to them. Now the Gibeonites were not of the people of Israel but of the remnant of the Amorites. Although the people of Israel had sworn to spare them, Saul had sought to strike them down in his zeal for the people of Israel and Judah.
korean_text: 기브온 사람은 이스라엘 족속이 아니요 그들은 아모리 사람 중에서 남은 자라 이스라엘 족속들이 전에 그들에게 맹세하였거늘 사울이 이스라엘과 유다 족속을 위하여 열심이 있으므로 그들을 죽이고자 하였더라 이에 왕이 기브온 사람을 불러 그들에게 물으니라

sentences.original_text: So the king called the Gibeonites
Now the Gibeonites were not of the people of Israel
but of the remnant of the Amorites.
Although the people of Israel had sworn to spare them,
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 백성이 그들을 살려주겠다고 맹세했음에도 불구하고

sentences.original_text: Saul had sought to strike them down
in his zeal for the people of Israel and Judah.
